name: Hot Stake
description: Welcome to Hot Stake, a humble operator with ambitious aspirations. Our unwavering dedication centers around ensuring 100% uptime for our EigenLayer restakers. Our mission is to help those in need, including our fellow humans! All commissions and rewards we receive for our services will be dedicated to bringing a bit of joy to those who are deprived and underprivileged. Join us and restake your claim to earn rewards while making a positive impact!
